name: mseckington (@mseckington@mastodon.social)
summary:
Do you prefer reading an article or watching a video? I've got several talks that I never turned into blog posts, and am wondering whether it makes more sense to reshare the videos more widely or take time to turn them into posts.

I personally like both formats, but know I end up more likely reading something than watching something! Curious to see what other folks' preferences are.
